page.title: 10SCHOOLS
page.content: Our school is Croftlands Junior School. About 280 pupils attend the school and there are 9 classes. Mr.E. Shuttleworth is the headmaster and he teaches all the boys how to play football. Mr.J.Greenwood looks after the computers and the video. Mrs.R. McWilliams organises the artwork and she took the photographs for this survey. Mrs.A.Larbalestier did the land survey with her class. Mrs.E.Dent is in charge of music, Mrs.C.McKenna-Language, Mrs.J.Simpson- Resources and Mrs.Harrison-Humanities. Other members of staff are Miss J. Taylor, Mrs.K.Rowland-Smith and Mrs.J. Rowe.Our deputy head is Mrs.J.Ireland. On the same site is Croftlands Infant Sshool. Mrs.P.Smith is head. There is also a playgroup. On leaving Croftlands the children go to Victoria Comprehensive School,Ulverston.
